title: xct_tshangs-dbyangs-rgya-mtsho'i-mgul-glu
body: shar phyogs ri bo'i rtse nas dkar gsal zla ba shar byung ma skyes a ma'i zhal ras yid la 'khor 'khor byas byung na ning btab pa'i ljang gzhon da lo sog ma'i phon lcog pho gzhon rgas pa'i lus po lho gzhu de las gyong ba rang sems song ba'i mi de gtan gyi mdun mar byung na rgya mtsho'i gting nas nor bu lon pa de dang mnyam byung 'gro zhor lam bu'i snying thub lus dri zhim pa'i bu mo g.yu chung gru dkar brnyed nas skyur ba de dang 'dra byung mi chen dpon po'i sras mo khams 'bras mtshar la bltas na kham sdong mthon po'i rtse nas 'bras bu smin pa 'dra byung sems pa phar la shor nas mtshan mo'i gnyid thebs gcog gi nyin mo lag tu ma lon yid thang chad rogs yin pa me tog nam zla yal song g.yu sbrang sems pa ma skyo byams pa'i las 'phro zad par nga ni skyo rguy mi 'dug rtsi thog ba mo'i kha la skya ser rlung gi pho nya me tog sbrang bu gnyis kyi 'bral mtshams byed mkhan los yin ngang pa 'dam la chags nas re zhig sdod dgos bsams kyang mtsho mo dar kha 'grigs nas rang sems kho thag chod song gru shan sems pa med kyang rta mgos phyi mig bltas byung khrel gzhung med pa'i byams pas nga la phyi mig mi lta nga dang tshong 'dus bu mo'i tshig gsum dam bca'i mdud pa khra bo'i sbrul la ma brgyab rang rang sa la grol song chung 'dris byams pa'i rlung bskyed lcang ma'i logs la btsugs yod lcang srung a jo zhal ngos rdo ka rgyag pa ma gnang bris pa'i yi ge nag chung chu dang thig pas 'jig song ma bris sems kyi ri mo bsubs kyang zub rgyu mi 'dug rgyab pa'i nag chung the 'us gsung skad 'byon ni mi shes khrel dang gzhung gi the 'u so so'i sems la skyon dang stong ldan ha lo'i me tog mchod pa'i rdzas la phebs na g.yu sbrang gzhon nu nga yang lha khang nang la khrid dang sems song bu mo mi bzhugs dam pa'i chos la phebs na pho gzhon nga yang mi sdod ri khrod 'grim la thal 'gro mtshan ldan bla ma'i drung du sems 'khrid zhu bar phyin pas sems pa 'gor kyang mi thub byams pa'i phyogs la shor song sgom pa'i bla ma'i zhal ras yid la 'char rgyu mi 'dug ma sgom byams pa'i zhal ras yid la wa le wa le sems pa 'di la 'gro 'gro dam pa'i chos la phyin na tshe gcig lus gcig nyid la sangs rgyas thob pa 'dug go dag pa shel ri gangs chu klu bdud rdo rje'i zil pa bdud rtsi sman gyi phab rgyun chang ma ye shes mkha' 'gro dam tshig gtsang mas btung na ngan song myong dgos mi 'dug rlung rta yar 'gro'i dus la rlung bskyed dar lcog btsugs pas mdzangs ma ma bzang bu mo'i mgron po la ni bos byung so dkar lpags pa'i 'dzum mdangs bzhugs gral spyi la bltas na mig zur khra mo'i sgril mtshams gzhpn pa'i gdong la bltas byung ha cang sems la song nas 'grogs 'dris e yong dris pas 'chi bral byed na min na gson bral mi byed gsungs byung mdzangs ma'i thugs dang bstun na tshe 'di'i chos skal chad 'gro dben pa'i ri khrod 'grims na bu mo'i thugs dang 'gal gro sbrang bu rgya la bcug 'dra kong phrug gzhon pa'i blo sna zhag gsum nyal rogs byas pas phugs yul lha chos dran byung gtan grogs khyod la bsams pa'i khrel dang ngo tsha med na mgo la rgyab pa'i gsug g.yus skad cha smras ni mi shes 'dzum dang so dkar ston phyogs gzhon pa'i blo khrid yin 'dug snying nas sha tsha yod med dbu mna' bzhes rogs gnang dang snying thub bya rdo lam 'phrad a ma chang mas sbyar byung lan chags bu lon byung na 'tsho skyong khyod ras gnang zhu snying gtam pha mar ma bshad chung 'dris byams par bshad pas byams pa shwa pho mang nas gsang gtam dgra bos go song snying thub yid 'phrog lha mo rngon pa rang gis zin kyang dbang chen mi yi dpon po nor bzang rgyal bus 'phrogs song nor bu rang la yod dus nor bu'i nor nyams ma chod nor bu mi la shor dus snying rlung stod la tshangs byung rang la dga' ba'i byams pa gzhan la mdun mar blangs song khong nang sems pa'i gcong gis lus po'i sha yang bskams song snying thub rku la shor song mo phywa rtsis 'bul ran song bu mo gdung sems can ma rmi lam nang la 'khor song bu mor 'chi ba med pa chang la 'dzad pa mi 'dug gzhon pa'i gtan gyi skyabs gnas 'di la bcol bas los chog bu mo a mar ma skyes kham bu'i shing la skyes sam a gsar zad pa kham bu'i me tog de las mgyogs pa bu mo chung 'dris byams pa spyang ki'i rigs rgyud min nam sha 'dris lpags 'dris byung yang ri la yar grabs mdzad kyis rta rgod ri la rgyab pa rnyi dang zhags pas zin gyis byams pa ngo log rgyab pa mthu ngo zin pa mi 'dug brag dang rlung po bsdebs nas rgod po'i sgro la gzan byung gyo can rdzu bag can gyis nga la gzan po byas byung sprin pa kha ser gting nag sad dang se ra'i gzhi ma ban de skya min ser min sangs rgyas bstan pa'i dgra bo sa de kha zhu gting 'khyags rta pho gtong sa ma red gsar 'grogs byams pa'i phyogs su snying gtam bshad sa ma red tshes chen bco lnga'i zla ba yin pa 'dra ba 'dug ste zla ba'i dkyil gyi ri bong tshe zad tshar nas 'dug go zla ba 'di nas phar 'gro rting ma'i zla ba tshur yong bkra shis zla ba dkar po'i zla stod phyogs la mjal yong dbus kyi ri gyal lhun po ma 'gyur brtan par bzhugs dang nyi ma zla ba'i bskor phyogs nor yong bsam pa mi 'dug tshes gsum zla ba dkar ba dkar gos nang na chod song bco lnga'i nam dang mnyam pa'i zhal bzhes cig kyang gnang zhu sa bcu'i dbyings su bzhugs pa'i dam can rdo rje chos skyong mthu dang nus pa yod na bstan pa'i dgra bo sgrol dang khu byug mon nas yong bas gnam lo'i sa bcud 'phel song nga dang byams pa phrad nas lus sems lhod por langs song skye 'gro mi rtag 'chi ba snying nas ma dran zer na spyang grung 'dzoms mdog kha yang don la lkugs pa 'dra byung khyi de stag khyi gzig khyi ldag kha ster nas 'dris song nang gi stag mo ral 'dzoms 'dris nas mthu ru langs song sha 'jam lus po 'dris kyang byams pa'i gdeng tshod mi lon sa la ri mo bris pas nam mkha'i skar tshod thig byung nga dang byams pa'i sdebs sa lho rong ljon pa'i nags gseb smra mkhan ne tso ma gtogs su dang gang gis mi shes smra mkhan ne tso o shes gsang kha mdo la ma gnang lha sa mi tshogs mthug la 'phyongs rgyas mi spus dag pa nga la yod pa'i chung 'dris 'phyongs rgyas gzhung la yod do khyi rgan rgya bo zer ba rnam shes mi las spyang ba srod la langs song ma zer tho rangs log byung ma zer srod la byams pa btsal bas tho rangs kha ba bab byung gsang dang ma gsang mi 'dug zhabs rjes gangs la bzhag yod po ta la ru bzhugs dus rig 'dzin tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho lha sa zhol du sdod dus 'chal po dwangs bzang dbang po sha 'jam mal sa nang gi snying thub gdung sems can ma o lo'i rgyu nor 'phrog pa'i gyo sgyu bshad pa min 'gro dbu zwa dbu la bzhes song dbu lcang rgyab la dbyugs song ga ler phebs shig byas pas ga ler bzhugs shig gsung gis thugs sems skyo yong byas pas mgyogs po 'phrad yong gsungs byung bya de khrung khrung dkar mo nga la gshog rtsal g.yar dang thag ring rgyang la mi 'gro li thang bskor nas slebs yong shi de dmyal ba'i yul gyi chos rgyal las kyi me long 'di na khrig khrig mi 'dug de nas khrig khrig gnang zhu mda' mo 'ben la phog song mde'u sa la 'dzul song chung 'dris byams pa 'phrad byung sems nyid rjes la 'brangs song rgya gar shar gyi rma bya kong yul mthil gyi ne tso 'khrungs sa 'khrungs yul mi gcig 'dzoms sa chos 'khor lha sa mi tshos nga la lab pa dgongs su dag pa khag theg o lo'i gom gsum phra mo gnas mo'i nang la thal song lcang ma byi 'ur sems shor byi 'u lcang mar sems shor sems shor mthun pa byung na skya khra hor pas mi thub da lta'i tshe thung 'di la de kha tsam zhig zhus nas rting ma byis pa'i lo la mjal 'dzom e yong blta 'o bya de smra mkhan ne tso kha rog bzhugs rogs mdzod dang lcang gling a lce 'jol mo gsung snyan skyur dgos byas byung rgyab kyi klu bdud btsan po 'jigs dang mi 'jigs mi 'dug mdun gyu ka ra ku shu 'thogs su dgos pa byas song dang po ma mthong chog pa sems pa shor don mi 'dug gnyis pa ma 'dris chog pa sems gcong yong don mi 'dug
